name: test_e2e_with_logs[275_PATH_ENC_ADV_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_ENC_ADV_002` |
| **Name** | Unicode dot encoding traversal |
| **Category** | PATH_TRAVERSAL |
| **Subcategory** | advanced_encoding |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `%u002e%u002e/etc/passwd`
